name: Block Runner (Vojmir)
description:
RUN! The Red Block is Out to Get You... Aim to Clear the Most Sections Possible! 


Submission for Trijam #204: The 3-Hour Game Jam

An Endless-Runner Developed by 3 Developers with 3 Hours Each in UE5.1.

Developers:

Vojmir Vladilo-Molina
Chance Richardson
Donato Colangelo
